text:
Add a copy task without a todir and tofile attribute specified. You receive the 
following message:

One of destfile or destdir must be set.

Similarly, add both attributes (not allowed ) you receive the following message:

Only one of destfile and destdir may be set.

The messages imply that the copy task requires attributes named destdir or 
destfile, when in fact the attributes are tofile and todir.
creator: peterwlynch@yahoo.com
peterwlynch@yahoo.com
text: Submitted patch to ant-dev@jakarta.apache.org on November 6, 2001.

Ooops,

In fact I guess this should be marked resolved by whoever adds the patch.

Sorry bout that.
